c74object.name: sadam.normalize~
c74object.digest: An object that sets the gain of a source to the level of a reference signal
c74object.description:
sadam.normalize~
takes a source and a reference signal, computes their average gain (doing an average over the absolute values or the square root of the sum of the square of the absolute values of the incoming signals) and rescales the source signal to have the same gain as the reference signal.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: (float/signal) Expected Output Gain or Reference Signal

objarg.name: reference gain
objarg.description: Sets the output gain (in linear scale). It only has effect is there is no reference signal present. Default: 0.

objarg.name: averaging interval
objarg.description: Sets the averaging interval (in number of samples) used for measuring the levels of the source and reference signals. Default: 100.

method.name: float
method.description: If there is no reference signal, it sets the expected output (linear) gain.

method.name: rms
method.description: If nonzero, averaging will be done over the square root of the sum of the absolute values of the incoming signals. Otherwise a simple average over the absolute values will be taken.

example.caption: The signal that comes from the first audio input scaled to the level of a -3dB-normalized pink noise generator.
